Back To Recipes

recipe

Ingredients

Tomato Paste 12 ounces
Apple Cider Vinegar 1½ cups
Worcestershire Sauce 2 Tbsp
Liquid Smoke 1 Tbsp
Smoked Paprika 2 tsp
Garlic Powder 1 tsp
Onion Powder ½ tsp
Sea Salt ½ tsp
Chilli Powder ¼ tsp
Cayenne Pepper ¼ tsp
Monk Fruit ⅛ tsp
Water 1½ cups

0 calories (Tomato Paste/Apple Cider Vinegar/Worcestershire Sauce/Liquid Smoke/Smoked Paprika/Garlic Powder/Onion Powder/Sea Salt/Chilli Powder/Cayenne Pepper/Monk Fruit Data Missing)

0 fiber (Tomato Paste/Apple Cider Vinegar/Worcestershire Sauce/Liquid Smoke/Smoked Paprika/Garlic Powder/Onion Powder/Sea Salt/Chilli Powder/Cayenne Pepper/Monk Fruit/Water Data Missing)

0 protein (Tomato Paste/Apple Cider Vinegar/Worcestershire Sauce/Liquid Smoke/Smoked Paprika/Garlic Powder/Onion Powder/Sea Salt/Chilli Powder/Cayenne Pepper/Monk Fruit Data Missing)

0 total_cost (Tomato Paste/Apple Cider Vinegar/Worcestershire Sauce/Liquid Smoke/Smoked Paprika/Garlic Powder/Onion Powder/Sea Salt/Chilli Powder/Cayenne Pepper/Monk Fruit Data Missing)

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 25 Minutes

Get out sauce pan
Add 12 ounces Tomato Paste
Add 1½ cups Apple Cider Vinegar
Add 2 Tbsp Worcestershire Sauce
Add 1 Tbsp Liquid Smoke
Add 2 tsp Smoked Paprika
Add 1 tsp Garlic Powder
Add ½ tsp Onion Powder
Add ½ tsp Sea Salt
Add ¼ tsp Chilli Powder
Add ¼ tsp Cayenne Pepper
Add ⅛ tsp Monk Fruit
Add 1½ cups Water
Timer 5 minutes Put sauce pan on heat 5 until boil
Timer 20 minutes Put sauce pan on heat 3 with lid
